CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Breakfast Rush Order}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Seasonal Special Order}.

VE.A: Seasonal Special Order's average order value in 1981 is {36.35} $.

VE.A: Breakfast Rush Order's average order value in 1992 is {125.78} $.

VE.A: Seasonal Special Order's average order value in 1983 is {38.59} $.

VE.Q: What are the average order value of Breakfast Rush Order, Seasonal Special Order, and Premium Delivery in 2002?
VE.A: Breakfast Rush Order's average order value is {325.21} $, Seasonal Special Order's average order value is {67.33} $, Premium Delivery's average order value is {88.87} $.

EVJ.A: The global minimum total average order value is {87.16} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Average Order Value in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total average order value is {562.63} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Order Value go below 156 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {119.04} $ in {1981}, total value was {145.89} $ in {1984}, total value was {135.17} $ in {1983}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Order Value fall between 222 and 246 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Order Value exceed 312 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {481.41} $ in {2002}, total value was {562.63} $ in {2004}, total value was {313.99} $ in {1996}.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1997, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 1986 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total average order value between {1991} and {1997} was {higher} than between {1986} and {1994}.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1997, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between {1984} and {1997} was {larger} than between {1978} and {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 2002, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between {1983} and {2002} was {larger} than between {1980} and {1982}.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1993, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 1992 and 1997?
NC.A: The average total average order value between {1984} and {1993} was {lower} than between {1992} and {1997}.
